_comment: EXAMPLE DATA - This file contains demonstration alert data for the Electric Home Hub platform. In production, this would be replaced by live API endpoints serving real device alerts and notifications.
_demo_note: These are fictional smart home device alerts showcasing various severity levels, alert types, and maintenance notifications for demonstration purposes only.

alerts.title: Firmware Security Update Required
alerts.description: Samsung has released a critical security update for your refrigerator. Update within 7 days to maintain secure operation.

alerts.title: Battery Level Low
alerts.description: Your Ring Video Doorbell Pro battery is at 15%. Charge soon to avoid service interruption.

alerts.title: Software Update Available
alerts.description: Roomba i7+ has a new software update with improved navigation and cleaning patterns.

alerts.title: Filter Replacement Due
alerts.description: Your Nest Thermostat's air filter needs replacement. Order a new filter to maintain optimal air quality.
